### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Pipe network at position(x=-9.5, y=24.5)
Consists of pipe connections between offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5) and boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the entities are compatible and can be connected.
### Errors when inserting coal into boiler
- Ensure that the boiler is not already full of fuel before attempting to insert coal.
- Make sure that the agent has enough coal in its inventory to insert into the boiler.
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drills have enough fuel to operate before attempting to mine.
- Make sure that the burner mining drills are placed correctly and have a clear path to the resource they are trying to mine.
